commitResults.messageBody: Rename the main class and added greetings and exit message
Improve skeletal version so that it echos command entered by user, except for command bye

commitResults.messageTitle: Ability to store and display text
commitResults.messageBody: Add ability to store and display text back to the user when requested
Add the ability to mark and unmark tasks as done. Created a new Task class
Added support for tracking these tasks: ToDos, Events, Deadlines

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor command handling in Pallo class
commitResults.messageBody:
- Introduced a new PalloException class for better error handling.
- Refactored command processing logic to separate methods for marking, unmarking, adding todos, deadlines, and events.
- Improved user feedback for invalid inputs and task management commands.
- Enhanced code readability and maintainability by reducing complexity in the main loop.

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Delete functionality and refactor Pallo class for improved command handling and structure
commitResults.messageBody:
- Introduced a constructor to initialize TaskList and Scanner.
- Replaced the main method's command processing with a dedicated run method.
- Added delete functionality

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Task class to use TaskStatus enum
commitResults.messageBody: - Replaced boolean isDone with TaskStatus for better state management.
Edited EXPECTED.TXT for expected result when input from input.txt is given

commitResults.messageTitle: Add storage functionality for task persistence
commitResults.messageBody: - Introduced Storage class to handle loading and saving tasks to a file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add DateParser class for date/time handling
commitResults.messageBody:
- Introduced DateParser class to parse and format date/time strings.
- Updated Deadline and Event classes to use LocalDateTime for date/time representation.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Pallo class to improve UI interaction and storage handling
commitResults.messageBody:
- Updated Pallo class to use a dedicated Ui instance for user interactions instead of static methods.
- Modified Storage class to accept a file path in the constructor and renamed methods for clarity.
- Enhanced error handling and user feedback during task loading and saving processes.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit tests to test for command parsing and date parsing
Add JavaDoc comments to all methods

commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented FIND command in Pallo class to search for tasks by keyword.
- Added findTasks method in TaskList class for case-insensitive task searching.
- Updated Parser class to handle FIND command input and error messaging.
Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

- Added Checkstyle plugin to build.gradle with version 11.0.0.
- Created checkstyle.xml to enforce coding standards based on SE Education guidelines.
- Added suppressions.xml to ignore Javadoc checks for test files.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix formatting errors raised by checkstyle
Add JavaFX GUI components and launcher
commitResults.messageBody:
- Introduced JavaFX dependencies in build.gradle for cross-platform support.
- Created Launcher class to handle application startup and classpath issues.
- Implemented Main and MainWindow classes for the main GUI interface.
- Added DialogBox class for user interaction with image and text display.

- Added assertions to ensure correct number of parts for deadline and event commands.
- Implemented assertions to validate non-empty descriptions and dates in Parser class.
- Added assertions in Deadline and Event constructors to check for non-null date parameters.
- Included assertions in Task and TaskList classes to validate task descriptions and search keywords.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor command execution in Pallo class
commitResults.messageBody:
- Introduced a constant for the default file path to improve maintainability.
- Modified executeCommand method to return responses instead of directly interacting with the UI.
- Updated command handling methods to return messages for UI display.
- Enhanced showMessage method in Ui class to handle multi-line messages for better output formatting.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor task searching and display logic to use Java Streams
commitResults.messageBody:
- Updated findTasks method in TaskList class to use Java Streams for improved readability and performance.
- Refactored task display in Ui class to utilize IntStream for formatting output, enhancing code clarity.
Enhance input validation with assertions
Refactor command execution in Pallo class
Refactor task searching and display logic to use Java Streams
